name: Iracund Taxi
description:
No cheap tricks here! We don't try to keep you in game, you are free to go whenever you want. Just come and drive your taxi car with passion. No ads, no in-game purchases, no tricks. Just pure gameplay.

> Did you want to unlock new car? Earn coins! No daily bonus, no in-app purchase coins. You need to pick customers and deliver them to where they wanna be in time.

> Are you late for customer? No second chances! You won't get rid of it just by watching an ad or spending some gems. You will lose 500 coins which you earned in very hard way earlier.

> Are you run out of fuel while you drive around? You can choose to try walk until gas station. But be careful, it's dangerous outside! Best option is calling a Road Support Team. It will cost you 1K coins but being alive is all that matters, right? You can earn it again.

Enjoy the purest taxi simulator game in App Store. Made by moonfy.
